description: Test prompts for Dashboard generation at different complexity levels

simple: Create a simple dashboard showing key metrics
Generate basic visualizations for the data
Display the main KPIs in a dashboard format
standard: Generate a comprehensive dashboard with multiple chart types and key insights
Create a dashboard showing trends, comparisons, and important metrics
Develop a balanced dashboard with visualizations and summary statistics
detailed: Generate a detailed dashboard with extensive visualizations, drill-down metrics, and analytical insights
Create an in-depth dashboard showing correlations, patterns, and detailed breakdowns
Produce a sophisticated dashboard with multiple views and comprehensive data analysis
comprehensive: Generate an executive dashboard with complete data analysis, predictive insights, and strategic recommendations
Create a full-featured dashboard with real-time metrics, historical trends, forecasts, and actionable intelligence
Develop a comprehensive analytical dashboard with multi-dimensional analysis and business intelligence
